Summary: For the last sever months we see a bright blinking light towards the Socorro mtn. then we see several diamond shaped objects slowly travel together and hover then descend into the Manzano mtns. or by Socorro.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mountainair
There were no other sightings in Mountainair on or around November 10th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out the window and then saw bright blinking lights go on and off towards the Socorro Mountains and when I looked up I saw two or three diamond shaped ojbects blinking amber, blue and red slowly go from above our house to over towards the Socorro mtns. where the light would eventually go out. Sometimes they travelled west towards the Manzano Mtns. and looked like they either descended into the mtns or the light was just turned off. Prior to any movement there is always a bright blinking light from the Socorro mtn direction. I sent the a digital photo to the exec. director of Mufon. I could not get my files to attach to this report. I also have two additional pictures. It looks like a stationary star, but when you photograph it...you can see it moves pretty rapidly.
